content: The Buddha's Right Hand (Material) is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Right_Hand_(Material).md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Right Hand (Material)'.
The content is as follows:
The Buddha's Right Hand (Material) is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
